page.title: 12A TYPICAL DAY IN MUMS LIFE..
page.content: {A TYPICAL DAY IN MY MUM'S LIFE My mother is the village postmistress. she is not fat like you imagine but young and nice looking.Her day starts before 8 0'clock.She gets the post office books ready while my dad and brother and I get our breakfasts.I help my mum take out the sweets and cards to the post office. Monday and Tuesday are her busy days because of pension.She waits in the house for customers after she puts up the open sign.If no one comes she does housework or gardening.We go home for lunch and my mum talks mostly about what the customers have said. In the afternoons house work or post office work,or preparing our dinner .At night she kitts and watches televishion. she goes to the W.R.I sometimes and plays Badminton and jogs.
